      Returns:
      true or false

      java.io.IOException

    • findAccountByEmail

      Account findAccountByEmail​(java.lang.String email) throws java.io.IOException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      this function can search if the email is just registered into the db.
      Parameters:
      email - is the pk to find the user into the db
      Returns:
      the Account if the email is registered, or "null" if the email isn't registered.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

      password - updated
      Returns:
